summary: An abandoned zebra grows up believing he is a racehorse, and, with the help of his barnyard friends and a teenage girl, sets out to achieve his dream of racing with thoroughbreds.
cast: Bruce Greenwood|Hayden Panettiere|Caspar Poyck|Gary Bullock|Wendie Malick|M. Emmet Walsh|Thandi Puren|Morné Visser|Dawn Matthews|Matt Stern|John Lesley|Graeme Hawkins|Tarryn Meaker|Frankie Muniz|Mandy Moore|Michael Clarke Duncan|Jeff Foxworthy|Joshua Jackson|Snoop Dogg|Joe Pantoliano|Michael Rosenbaum|Steve Harvey|David Spade|Fred Thompson|Dustin Hoffman|Whoopi Goldberg|Jansen Panettiere|Frankie Ryan Manriquez|Kyle Alcazar|David Busch|Robert Clotworthy|Nicholas Guest|Archie Hahn|Jess Harnell|Phil Proctor|Gail Thomas|Dee Bradley Baker|Denise Fox|Joshua Seth
title: Héroe a rayas
